description:
When you have a cock as big as Daniel's, you just gotta try having it sucked by another guy. Especially by an expert like Trey!
"It's a little strange, to tell you the truth" Daniel said, referring to the situation.
Sometimes during shoots, things don't always go as planned.
We hadn't discussed Daniel dropping his load in Trey's mouth, but that's what happened!
So, how did Daniel rate the blow job?
"It was damn good," he said. "Wouldn't mind it again, I'll tell you that!"
title: Blowing Daniel
